name: Street Bikeability (AI Template)
description: Template created from project: Street Bikeability (AI Template)
author: Admin AI

config.title: Urban Streetscape Bikeability Survey: Design Interventions and Socio-Economic Impacts
config.description: This survey focuses on understanding the impact of design interventions and socio-economic factors on the bikeability of urban streetscapes. Your insights will help us refine urban planning strategies to enhance cycling environments.

pages.name: introduction
pages.title: Survey Introduction
pages.description:
Welcome to the Urban Streetscape Bikeability Survey. This research examines the effectiveness of design interventions and socio-economic impacts on bikeability across various urban contexts. 

**Research Question:** How do design interventions and socio-economic factors influence the bikeability of urban environments?

pages.name: methodology
pages.title: Methodology and Sampling Strategy
pages.description: This survey targets urban cyclists from diverse backgrounds. We aim to collect responses from 1,000 cyclists using both online and offline methods, such as partnering with local community organizations and conducting paper surveys in key urban areas. This approach ensures a representative sample across different urban contexts.

pages.name: conclusion
pages.title: Conclusion
pages.description: Thank you for participating in the Urban Streetscape Bikeability Survey. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us understand the factors that influence cycling in urban environments.
